block.p: Andrea Sevil Barker, a daughter of Patricia and Demir Barker of Middletown, N.Y., was married Friday evening to Michael Anthony DiSalvo, a son of M. J. and Frank DiSalvo of Highland Falls, N.Y. The Rev. Michael McCoughlin, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony at Sacred Heart Church in Highland Falls, N.Y.
The couple received associate's degrees from the Culinary Institute of America.

Andrea Sevil Barker, a daughter of Patricia and Demir Barker of Middletown, N.Y., was married Friday evening to Michael Anthony DiSalvo, a son of M. J. and Frank DiSalvo of Highland Falls, N.Y. The Rev. Michael McCoughlin, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony at Sacred Heart Church in Highland Falls, N.Y.
The couple received associate's degrees from the Culinary Institute of America.

Mrs. DiSalvo, 27, is a director of content development at Restaurant-Trade.com, a company in New York that helps restaurants and food suppliers do business on the internet. Mr. DiSalvo, 25, is a sous-chef at Restaurant Jean Georges in New York.
